channel.title: Attached Files on Phrozen
channel.description: Recent content in Attached Files on Phrozen

item.title: Enum Attached Files
item.description: Above snippet demonstrate how to enumerate files openned by running programs on Windows. Some file unlocker use that technique to find where a specific file is attached and then force processes using that file to release it handle (via code injection techniques). I will write an example in a future snippet thread. Notice: At the bottom of that page, you will see a concreate example about how to use that unit.
